job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: Are you excited by turning unstructured data into actionable insights and recommendations Then this opportunity is for youbrbrBodhala is looking to add a talented and motivated Machine Learning Engineer to our growing technology team As a data scientist you will collaborate with product managers and domain experts to develop new capabilities and features for Bodhalas products We need a person who can work handson as an engineer solving complex problems and building advanced software systemsbrbrWe are committed to using data to drive impact growing together as a team embracing openness and positivity  and were looking for individuals who are motivated by those same principlesbrbrstronguResponsibilitiesbrustrongulli Partner with product management and engineering teams throughout the product development lifecycle to solve full stack Data Science problemslili Develop creative and analytically driven solutions using advanced statistical and mathematical science techniques such as machine learningAI mathematical modeling statistical analysislili Document data pipelines transformations and model details necessary for repeatable outcomeslili Comfortable with responsibly handling sensitive personal and corporate datalili Working closely with and mentoring teammatesbrliulstronguQualificationsbrustrongulli Youve spent 34 years in a data science rolelili Excellent communication skillslili Background in machine learning and statistical analysislili You are exciting to solve complex problems building advanced software systemslili You adapt quickly to utilize software engineering best practiceslili You demonstrate the ability to deliver quality software collaborativelybrliulstronguPreferred SkillsbrbrustrongExperts are of course welcome nonexperts are also encouraged to apply Were all here to learnbrulli Experience with Python Julia or Rlili Experience with SciKit Learn Tensorflow Keras Pytorch Numpy and Pandaslili Knowledge and experience with NLP technologybrliulWhy work at BodhalabrbrAt Bodhala we look for individuals who are motivated by complex and challenging work We want to work with people who share compelling solutions to those challenges solutions informed by their unique experiences passions and expertisebrulli You will have a lot of responsibility the ability to make an immediate direct impact and many opportunities to advance your careerlili You will get firsthand experience of working for a wellfunded early stage startuplili Your dedication ownership and selfsustainability will be greatly valuedlili You will work with a team of extremely smart and talented people who value collaboration and hard worklili We offer great benefits  bestinclass health dental and vision coverage a 401K match with no required vesting period a generous parental leave policy commuter and fitness subsidies an FSA program and morelili Competitive compensation including a Long Term Incentive PlanbrliulstronguAbout BodhalabrbrustrongBodhala is a legal spend management platform founded to provide inhouse counsel and their legal operations teams with spend optimization solutions and realtime market intelligence Bodhalas platform applies data science machinelearning and AI to help companies find the right lawyer at the right firm for the right price Founded by attorneys the company serves customers across the Fortune 500 and critical services economy industries Bodhala was recently named One to Watch in Legal Technology by the Financial Times and Legal Tech Innovation of 2020 by Legal Tech Breakthrough AwardsbrbrHeadquartered in New York City Bodhala tripled its headcount last year and is positioned for continued fastpaced growth with locations across the United States and in Europebrulli Bodhala is an Equal Opportunity Employer All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race color age religion sex national origin disability protected veteran status or any other characteristic protected under federal state or local lawliul
